comments.body: yep, that's their current error. I am talking to the authors to help them repro this.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +1,5 @@Exit Code: 1
Standard output:
node_modules/eventemitter3/index.d.ts(117,17): error TS2536: Type 'K' cannot be used to index type 'ArgumentMap<T>'.

comments.body: Error is different Monday morning than Friday afternoon, and eventemitter3 has published 4.0.1-.3 in the last 24 hours, so I think they're trying to fix type errors manually over there.

"Better TypeScript type definitions": https://github.com/primus/eventemitter3/issues/217

They will get it figured out eventually I guess.
